about_the_game:
Overview

"Nerd: Tracing Dayline" is an adventure game created with the concept of "a game for a single song." You, the protagonist, find yourself in a rural future where only the sound of waves can be heard. As you gather "topics" and interact with the people around you, you will come to understand the meaning behind the concept given to this game by the end of the story.

Story

Shiono Watanoha transfers to a high school in a remote seaside town. Struggling to fit in, she carries a notebook filled with "topics" and seeks to change her current situation. Through choices and reflections, will she be able to grasp something beyond the fragile and fleeting relationships?

Features

Throughout the story, you can jot down various "topics" from different situations.
Expand conversations from these "topics," gain information, and deepen relationships as you follow the story.

  • Conversations that expand as you gather and share "topics"
  • A world built in 3D with characters animated in 2D
  • (Currently) completely solo-developed
